statements.sql: select * from `product_categories` where `slug` = 'podsistema-nvf-ocinkovannaya' limit 1

select count(*) as aggregate from `products` inner join `product_product_category` on `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` where `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` = 94 and `status_id` = 1

select `products`.*, `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` as `pivot_product_category_id`, `product_product_category`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `product_product_category` on `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` where `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` = 94 and `status_id` = 1 order by `products`.`title` asc limit 20 offset 0

select *, `attribute_items`.`title` as `attribute_title`, `product_attributes`.`id` as `attribute_id`, `attribute_items`.`slug` as `attribute_code`, `option_items`.`title` as `option_title`, `option_items`.`slug` as `option_code` from `product_attributes` left join `option_items` on `option_item_id` = `option_items`.`id` left join `attribute_items` on `attribute_item_id` = `attribute_items`.`id` where exists (select * from `products` where `product_attributes`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` and exists (select * from `product_categories` inner join `product_product_category` on `product_categories`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` where `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` and `product_categories`.`id` = 94) and `status_id` = 1)

select `products`.*, `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` as `pivot_product_category_id`, `product_product_category`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `product_product_category` on `products`.`id` = `product_product_category`.`product_id` where `product_product_category`.`product_category_id` = 94
select * from `brands` where `brands`.`id` = 6 limit 1

select `tags`.*, `brand_tags`.`brand_id` as `pivot_brand_id`, `brand_tags`.`tag_id` as `pivot_tag_id` from `tags` inner join `brand_tags` on `tags`.`id` = `brand_tags`.`tag_id` where `brand_tags`.`brand_id` = 6

select `posts`.*, `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` as `pivot_post_category_id`, `post_category_post`.`post_id` as `pivot_post_id` from `posts` inner join `post_category_post` on `posts`.`id` = `post_category_post`.`post_id` where `post_category_post`.`post_category_id` in (1, 2, 3) and `active` = 1 and `show_in_header` = 1 order by `sort` desc
